basics.name: Keyang Yu
basics.summary: Keyang's research focuses on designing data-driven computer systems with an emphasis on improving Cybersecurity and User Privacy of Cyber-Physical Systems (CPS) and the Internet of Things (IoT).

work.name: Department of Computer Science, Klingler College of Arts and Sciences, Marquette University

publications.name: PACAS: A Privacy-Aware Smart Camera System
publications.summary: In Proceeding of the 9th IEEE Cloud Summit, June 27-28, 2024, Washington DC, USA.

publications.publisher: Su Wang, Keyang Yu, Qi Li, Dong Chen
publications.summary: In Proceeding of the 21st International Conference on Embedded Wireless Systems and Networks (EWSN 2024), December 10-13, 2024, Abu Dhabi, UAE.

publications.name: PAROS: The Missing “Puzzle” in Smart Home Router Operating Systems
publications.summary: In Proceeding of the 32nd International Conference on Computer Communications and Networks (ICCCN 2023), July 24-26, 2023, Honolulu, Hawaii, USA.

publications.name: TrafficSpy: Disaggregating VPN-encrypted IoT Network Traffic for User Privacy Inference

publications.summary: In Proceedings of the 10th IEEE Conference on Communications and Network Security (CNS 2022), October 3-5, 2022, Austin, Texas, USA.
